title: Entity Condition
description:
Entity Condition Types operate on an Entity, which also allows access to the world.
These are available to be used in most powers in the condition object field (or entity_condition in other power/condition types), which restricts when a power is active.
Type: 'origins:attribute'
- Applies a check towards a specific attribute value of the entity.

attribute.description: ID of the attribute of which the value should be checked. See Minecraft Fandom Wiki: Attribute (Attributes) for a list of vanilla attributes that can be checked for.

comparison.description: How to compare the attribute's value to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value to compare the attribute's value to.
